sentences.en: An asteroid seeding issue in the G 5 KW region has been addressed.
sentences.cn: G5KW星域的小行星带刷新问题已经提交.

sentences.en: Asteroid has become commonplace to the readers of interstellar travel stories in science fiction magazines.
sentences.cn: 对于读过科幻杂志中星际旅行故事的读者来说,小行星已是平淡无味了.

sentences.en: Asteroid lies between Mars and Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 小行星位于火星与木星之间.

sentences.en: Astronomers have detected an asteroid not far from Earth, moving in the same orbit around the Sun.
sentences.cn: 天文学家在距离地球不远处发现一颗与地球绕日轨道相同的小行星。

sentences.en: Between the orbits of Mars and Jupiter lies the asteroid belt.
sentences.cn: 火星和木星轨道之间是小行星带.

sentences.en: But he wanted to locate the impact site of the asteroid.
sentences.cn: 但是他想确定小行星的撞击地点.

sentences.en: Gargantuan asteroid to pass near Earth this fall.
sentences.cn: 大量小行星今秋将与地球错身而过.

sentences.en: He was an early proponent of the theory that life on Earth may have come from Mars in rocks ejected by asteroid and comet impacts.
sentences.cn: 他是这项理论早期的支持者：地球生命也许来自火星，通过小行星和彗星冲撞而由岩石喷射而出。

sentences.en: Large meteorites actually come from the asteroid belt.
sentences.cn: 大型陨星实际上是来自小行星带.

sentences.en: Look at the movies that we see all the time. It's easy to imagine the end of the world. An asteroid destroying all life and so on.
sentences.cn: 瞧瞧那些我们一直在看的电影，要想像世界末日那是很容易的事，比如一个小行星毁灭了所有生命之类的。

sentences.en: Moving on through the asteroid belt we enter the realms of the gas giant planets: Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune, all of which dwarf the Earth.
sentences.cn: 穿过小行星带继续前进，我们进入了气体巨行星区域：木星、土星、天王星、海王星，所有这些都使地球看起来像个侏儒。

sentences.en: The asteroid vaporized on impact, launching a cubic mile of rock into the sky.
sentences.cn: 小行星在碰撞时蒸发, 并向空中迸射出一立方英里的碎石.

sentences.en: The bad news is that forecasting asteroid impacts remains a tricky business.
sentences.cn: 坏消息是预测小行星撞击不是件容易事.

sentences.en: The debris possibly came from a comet or asteroid that hit Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 这些残骸可能来自彗星或者撞击木星的小行星.

sentences.en: The Geminides originate from mysterious 3200 Phaethon , which is an asteroid.
sentences.cn: 双子座流星雨是由神秘的第3200号小行星“非以颂”产生的.

sentences.en: The largest asteroid is Ceres, which is about a quarter the size of the moon.
sentences.cn: 最大的小行星是谷神星,体积约为月球的1/4.

sentences.en: There is an asteroid on a collision course with the Earth.
sentences.cn: 有一颗小行星可能会与地球发生碰撞。

sentences.en: You cannot make the jump to light - speed in this asteroid field.
sentences.cn: 你在这小行星群中不能跳入超光速.

sentences.en: You're not actually going into an asteroid field?

words.tran_cn: [天]小行星；[无脊椎]海盘车；小游星

trans.tran_en: one of the many small  planet s  that move around the Sun, especially between Mars and Jupiter
